catalogEntries.title: Level-Up Pack
catalogEntries.shortDescription: Rewards every 10 levels up to level 150, including Legendary Hero Shards!
catalogEntries.description:
<RT.CapsGreen>Complete Skybreaker Quests as you level!</>

<RT.CapsGold>Level Up Package Contents</> 
  <RT.BasicMed>Every 10 levels from 10 to 150</>
  <RT.BasicMed>10 Core Hero Maps</>
  <RT.BasicMed>100k Gold</>
  <RT.BasicMed>Packages cannot be lost</>  

<RT.BasicMed>The final package contains a Legendary Hero Map!</>
